entry.title: hello
entry.content: #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long long#define MOD 1000000007llusing namespace std;string L;ll dp[100005][2],n;ll qpow(ll a,ll b){    ll res=1;    while(b)    {        if(b&1)res=res*a%MOD;        a=a*a%MOD;b>>=1;    }    return res;}ll dfs(ll now,ll fa,bool dm){    if(dp[now][dm])return fa*dp[now][dm]%MOD;    if(now==n)return fa;    ll res=0,maxn=(dm?(L[now]-'0'):1);    if(dm)    {        if(maxn==1)        {        res=(res+dfs(now+1,1,0))%MOD;        res=(res+dfs(now+1,2,1))%MOD;        }        else        res=(res+dfs(now+1,1,1))%MOD;    }    else    res=qpow(3,n-now);    dp[now][dm]=res;    return res*fa%MOD;}int main(){    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0);    cin>>L;    n=L.size();    ll res=0;    res=(res+dfs(1,1,0))%MOD;    res=(res+dfs(1,2,1))%MOD;    cout<<res;}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
